lead_paragraph: The border was closed in 2011, when relations deteriorated after the south seceded after a civil war.
snippet: The border was closed in 2011, when relations deteriorated after the south seceded after a civil war.

headline.main: Sudan: President Opens Border With South Sudan
headline.print_headline: Africa; Sudan: President Opens Border With South Sudan

abstract: Pres Omar Hassan al-Bashir of Sudan orders opening of border with South Sudan for first time since 2011 secession; move follows unexpected unilateral normalization of relations by Pres Salva Kiir of South Sudan, in response to Sudan's reduction of oil transportation fees.
